usercard.moderator_viewercardBt_tt:
Your are a moderator on {CHANNEL} channel.
Open the viewer card for this channel.
usercard.following_end: Due to Twitch restrictions, this section will disapear after the {DATE}

delete_badge_confirm.title: Delete badge?
delete_badge_confirm.description: Associated users will lose the badge. This cannot be undone.

usercard.badge_disabled: You disabled this badge because you were not a Premium member anymore.
usercard.badge_nonPremium_limit: You reached the limit of {MAX} custom badges. Become a Premium member to create up to {MAX_PREMIUM} custom badges.
usercard.badge_disabled_notPremium: You can have {MAX} active badges. Delete other badges or become premium to create up to {MAX_PREMIUM} custom badges.
usercard.badge_premium_limit: You reached the maximum of {MAX} custom badges.
